name: BVS Solitaire Collection Saved Game
summary: A BVS file is a saved game file created by BVS Solitaire Collection, an application that allows users to play over 500 types of solitaire-style card games. It contains an in-progress game saved by a user. BVS files are used to resume paused games and share in-progress games with other BVS Solitaire Collection players.
